main event: A multi-hued glowing species was observed hovering at Lowry AFB for approximately 4 to 5 minutes on 9 July 1954 before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting involved military and civilian observations., The object was reported to have been seen at a high altitude, approximately 20,000 feet., Witnesses described the object as metallic in color and round or saucer-shaped., The objects were reported to travel at speeds of up to 1,300 miles per hour and made abrupt turns., Several civilians reported sightings of similar objects in the vicinity.
witness description: A civilian who reported seeing 6 or 7 objects at high altitude and high speed.
